description:
A man washes his horse in the river, and the horse is attacked by evil imps.  A white fox repays a debt.  A lord and a peasant woman exchange beautiful poems.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Horse and the Kaaranbe / The White Fox Repays a Debt / Sarasarayasara
Uma to Kaaranbe / Shirogitsune no Ongaeshi / Sarasarayasara
馬とカアランベ / 白狐の恩返し / さらさらやさら
